newsitem.title: USA: Jitney-Jungle to buy Delchamps for $30/shr.
newsitem.headline: Jitney-Jungle to buy Delchamps for $30/shr.

text.p: Regional supermarket chain Jitney-Jungle Stores of America said Tuesday it would acquire all of the outstanding stock of Delchamps Inc for $30 a share.
Delchamps had about 7.12 million shares of common stock as of March 31.
